rest api
post:
url: http://localhost:3000/session
body: {"chipId": "esp32-21342"}
response: 2520c4f7-e644-4624-bc5d-c00fb248351e

url: http://localhost:3000/validate
body: 	{

front end
https://khaja-pasha-shek.github.io/pi-validation/

backend
GET  https://pi-server-j62a.onrender.com/
GET  https://pi-server-j62a.onrender.com/sessions
POST https://pi-server-j62a.onrender.com/session   body:{"chipId": "esp32-abc123"}
